review_data.title: Great Chinese close to airport

review_data.title: An old man said: eat where local people eat, Szechuan Rest in Opfikon !
review_data.content: Szechuan Chinese food: what to say: perfect home made steamed dim sums, great Pekin duck and superb black beans shrimps (with a lot of chili). They have a skilled cook and a so friendly hostess. Chinese food can be so delightful. Good food - good...More
